trans-unit.source: Represents a project that can be built using [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].
A Project represents an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
It is a container for items, properties and targets.
It can load project content from in-memory XML or from an XML file, and can save to an XML file, preserving most whitespace and all XML comments.
Every Project must be associated with an <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> to access shared information.
During a build, the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> object keeps track of which projects are currently building.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> instance to use for creating the project in memory.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.ToolsVersion*>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> instance to use for creating the project in memory.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.ToolsVersion*> to use for creating the project in memory.
Adds an [Import](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the end of the project.
The name of the project file to import.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Project" name="Project" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Import" name="Import" href=""></xref> element.
The condition to evaluate before importing the project.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Import" name="Import" href=""></xref> element.
Adds the specified [Item](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the project.
This method attempts to add the item to the project near the other items in the item collection.
The name of the item collection to add the item to.
Corresponds to the user-defined name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Item" name="Item" href=""></xref> element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Include" name="Include" href=""></xref> attribute of the item.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> containing the created item.
Adds the specified [Item](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the project.
This method attempts to add the item to the project near the other items in the item collection.
The name of the item collection to add the item to.
Corresponds to the user-defined name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Item" name="Item" href=""></xref> element.
The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Include" name="Include" href=""></xref> attribute of the item.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `itemInclude` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> containing the created item.
Adds a new [ItemGroup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> containing the created item group.
Adds a new [PropertyGroup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the project.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to insert the <xref uid="langword_csharp_PropertyGroup" name="PropertyGroup" href=""></xref> at the end of the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> containing the created property group.
Adds a new [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element with the specified assembly file.
The name of the task to reference from the assembly.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TaskName" name="TaskName" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UsingTask" name="UsingTask" href=""></xref> element.
The file path to the assembly.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AssemblyFile" name="AssemblyFile" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UsingTask" name="UsingTask" href=""></xref> element.
Adds a new [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element with the specified assembly name.
The name of the task to reference from the assembly.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TaskName" name="TaskName" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UsingTask" name="UsingTask" href=""></xref> element.
The name of the assembly to load.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AssemblyName" name="AssemblyName" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UsingTask" name="UsingTask" href=""></xref> element.
Builds the default targets of the project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified target in the project.
The target to build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified list of targets in the project.
The list of targets to build.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to build the default targets.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified list of targets in the project, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The list of targets to build.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to build the default targets.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) if outputs are not needed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the specified list of targets in the project using the specified settings, and returns the outputs of the targets.
The list of targets to build.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to build the default targets.
The outputs of the built targets.
This parameter can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) if outputs are not needed.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildSettings"></xref> to apply to the build.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the build was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the project is enabled for building tasks and targets.
By default, this property uses value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildEnabled%2A> property of the project's <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.ParentEngine%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the project is enabled for building tasks and targets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the `DefaultTargets` attribute of the [Project](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
A semi-colon (;) delimited list of the targets specified in the `DefaultTargets` attribute.

Sets or gets the ToolsVersion XML attribute found on the [Project](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)[Project Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in the project file.
A string representing the Tools version.
Gets the encoding for the project file.
An <xref:System.Text.Encoding> value of the project file.
Gets a collection of the items evaluated during the build.
The returned <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> contains all the evaluated items in the project after wildcard and property expansion.
The items in this property represent the actual items used during the build process.
This property value is generated every time something in the project changes.
Changes to existing items in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting items will not impact the project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> containing the items evaluated during the build.

Gets a collection of all items in a project, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) attribute evaluated to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

The returned <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> contains all items in the project after wildcard and property expansion, including those that were not used during the build process due to `Condition` attributes evaluating to `false`.
This property value is only generated when certain changes occur, such as a new element being added to the project.
Adding or deleting items from this property does not impact the project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> containing all items in a project.
Gets a collection of the properties evaluated during the build.
The returned <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> contains all the evaluated properties in the project after performing condition evaluation and property expansion.
The properties in this collection include global properties, environment variables, reserved properties, and imported properties.
Changes to existing properties in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting properties will not impact the project.
> [!NOTE] > Cloning a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> can negatively impact performance.
Only use a copy of this property when it is strictly necessary.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> containing the properties evaluated during the build.
Gets or sets the fully qualified path and file name of the project file.
This property is an empty `string` if the project does not have a file associated with it.
The full path of the project file.
Returns a list of possible values for the specified property.
This method generates the list of possible values by inspecting all of the attributes in the project that involve the property.
The property to use when generating the list of possible values.
The list of possible values for the property.
Returns all evaluated items belonging to the specified item collection.
The name of the item collection.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> containing all of the evaluated items belonging to the specified item collection.
Returns all items belonging to the specified item collection.
The name of the specified item collection.

A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> containing all items belonging to the specified item collection, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) attribute evaluated to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the value of the specified property.
If you need to retrieve a large number of property values, use the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.EvaluatedProperties%2A> property.
The name of the property.
The value of the specified property.
Returns a string value of the XML from the specified element in the [ProjectExtensions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
The name of the element in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProjectExtensions" name="ProjectExtensions" href=""></xref> element to return.
The string value of the specified element in the `ProjectExtensions` element of the project.
Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

Global properties are properties set with the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties set by the integrated development environment before invoking [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].
For more information, see [MSBuild Command-Line Reference](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> containing the global properties for the project.
Gets whether the Project file has the ToolsVersion XML attribute.
An example ToolsVersion attribute is `Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`.
This attribute enables projects to target .NET Framework versions, currently 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5.
For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the project has the ToolsVersion attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the projects imported into this project.
Imported projects are specified by the element in the project.
An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref> of the projects imported into this project.
Gets or sets the `InitialTargets` attribute of the [Project](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
A semi-colon (;) delimited list of the targets specified in the `InitialTargets` attribute.
Gets a value indicating whether the project has changed and needs to be saved to a file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the project has changed and needs to be saved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the project is to be validated against a schema.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the project is to be validated against a schema; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a collection of the item groups specified with the [ItemGroup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in the project.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> returned by this property contains the item groups in this project and all imported projects.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection"></xref> containing the item groups specifiied in the project.
Loads the contents of the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader> into the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> to load.
The file used by the textReader is not a valid project file.
Loads the contents of the specified project file into the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object.
The project file to load.
The file specified by projectFileName is not a valid project file.
Reads the contents of this project from a string containing the XML contents.
A <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object containing the project contents.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings"></xref> value that specifies the settings for the project being loaded.
Reads the contents of this project from a project XML file on disk.
A string representing the name of the file to load.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings"></xref> value that specifies the settings for the project being loaded.
Loads the contents of the specified string into the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> object.
The string of XML to load.
The XML contained in projectXML is not a valid project file.
Reads the contents of this project from a string containing the XML contents.
A string containing the project contents.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings"></xref> value that specifies the settings for the project being loaded.
Sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.IsDirty*> property of the project to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> that builds the project.
The parent <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine"></xref> object.
Gets a collection of the property groups specified with the [PropertyGroup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in the project.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> returned by this property contains the property groups in this project and all imported projects.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref> containing the property groups specifiied in the project.
Removes all item groups from the project, but does not modify imported projects.
Removes all property groups from the project, but does not modify imported projects.
Removes the specified property group from the main project file.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> object representing the group to remove.
Removes the specified item from the project.
The item to remove from the project.
Removes the specified item group from the project.
The item group to remove from the project.
Removes all item groups with the specified [condition](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) from the project, but does not modify imported projects.
The condition to match when removing item groups.
Removes all items in the specified item collection from the project, but does not modify imported projects.
The item collection to remove.
Removes the specified property group from the project.
The property group to remove from the project.
Removes all property groups with the specified [condition](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) from the project, but does not modify imported projects.
The condition to match when removing property groups.
Removes all <PropertyGroup>'s from the main project file that have a specific "Condition."
This will not remove any property groups from imported project files.
A string representing the condition of the PropertyGroups that you want removed.
A boolean value indicating whether to include imported property groups in the search.
Resets the status every target in the project so that the next build will build all targets again.
Saves the project in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object in which to save the project.
Saves the project to the specified file.
The name of the file in which to save the project.
Saves the project in the specified file with the specified encoding.
The name of the file in which to save the project.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> value with which to save the file.
Gets or sets the XML schema file to use when validating the project.
The XML schema file to use when validating the project.
Sets the value of a property in the specified imported project.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> that contains the specified property.
Sets the value of a property in the specified imported project.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> that contains the specified property.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition"></xref> value indicating the location to insert the property.
Sets the value of a property in the specified imported project.
Sets the value of a property and optionally escapes it so that it will be treated as a literal value despite any special characters it may contain.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project"></xref> that contains the specified property.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition"></xref> value indicating the location to insert the property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the [ProjectExtensions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element of the project with the specified element name and content.
The name of the XML element to create as a child of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ProjectExtensions" name="ProjectExtensions" href=""></xref> element.
The text value of the created XML element.
Sets the value of the specified property.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
Sets the value of the specified property.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
Sets the value of the specified property.
SetProperty is called from the integrated development environment (IDE) to set a particular property at the project level.
This method searches the existing property groups for a property with this name.
If one is found, it changes its value.
Otherwise, it either adds a new property to that property group, or adds a new property group to the project.
SetProperty uses the `condition` parameter to determine the name of the property group place it in.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition"></xref> value indicating the location to insert the property.
Sets the value of the specified property.
The name of the property to change.
The value to assign the property.
The condition to use on the property.
Corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Condition" name="Condition" href=""></xref> attribute of the Property element.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition"></xref> value indicating the location to insert the property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the targets in the project.
Targets are specified by the element in the project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> of the targets in the project.
Gets a <xref:System.DateTime> object indicating the time the project was last changed in a way that required it to be saved to a file.
A <xref:System.DateTime> object indicating the time the project was last changed in a way that required it to be saved to a file.
Sets or gets the current version of the Toolset being used by the project.
If the Toolset version is overridden, that value becomes the effective Toolset version.
If there is a ToolsVersion attribute on the Project element, then that is the effective Toolset version.
Otherwise, the Toolset version is the same as the default Toolset version of the parent engine.
When set, ToolsVersion overrides the current Toolset version of the project with the provided value.
For more information about Toolsets, see [Standard and Custom Toolset Configurations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > To get or set the ToolsVersion attribute on the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> element, use the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.DefaultToolsVersion%2A> property.
A string representing the version number of the Toolset.
Gets a collection of the [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elements in the project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref> of the `UsingTask` elements in the project.
Gets the XML representing the project.
The full XML representing the project.
